title: How to enable again unsafe volume warning?
content: While using earphones and raising the volume, I accidentally pressed "Yes" when a the unsafe volume warning appeared. Now the warning is not appearing anymore. I have tried restarting my phone and reseting the app preferences, but the warning still does not appear. How do I enable the warning again, without having to reset my phone to factory settings?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
